resp = client.autoscaling.put_autoscaling_policy(
    name="my_autoscaling_policy",
    policy={
        "roles": [
            "data_hot"
        ],
        "deciders": {
            "proactive_storage": {
                "forecast_window": "10m"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
